"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I am aware that I need to immediately report any serious workplace accident which occurred in the workplace of hosting country to my Line Manager and to the People (HR) Departments in the country of employment and in the hosting country. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"I am aware that I need to comply with the travel rules which apply in the visiting country and any public health measures which are in place abroad, including for example, any testing requirements or national self-isolation / quarantine measures. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If required, I will complete a local H&S risk assessment to ensure that risks are identified, and steps are taken to effectively mitigate or at least minimise them. \\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":\"\\\"Calibri\\\",sans-serif\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-ansi-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-fareast-language\":\"EN-US\",\"mso-bidi-language\":\"AR-SA\"}}}]}]}]}}"
